title: Solutions & Services
description: We assess the best technical and economical solution. From Due Diligence of existing buildings to the development of new Standards, thanks to the specialized knowledge and experience acquired over the years and our constant pursuit of excellence. Based on a thorough analysis of the needs and requirements of our clients, we prepare complete detailed documentation in all project phases: Concept and Schematic Design, Design Development, and Construction Documents. This ensures minimal deviation from the planned budget, up to the commissioning and handover of IT systems.

wiredscore.title: Wiredscore Certifications & Technologies
wiredscore.description: We design and implement cutting-edge technologies for hospitality and real estate projects, delivering solutions aligned with international standards and Wiredscore certifications.

solutions.title: Project Engineering
solutions.description: End-to-end management, from concept to commissioning, ensuring flawless execution of every project.

solutions.title: On-Site Supervision
solutions.description: Ensuring flawless quality during every installation with dedicated on-site technical supervision.

solutions.title: Smart Integration
solutions.description: Coordinating providers and systems for seamless results and unified technological solutions.
